column1: Smoque BBQ////Everything is very good. I was lucky enough to go with people who all ordered different things and I tasted most of the meat offerings. Those offerings however
column2: are kind of limited. I know it's a BBQ place and they do what they do and they do it well and it's their thing and that's all
column3: but still the menu is small. That said
column4: the sauce is really good enough that they could serve only that
column5: alone and I think I would still come here from time to time. The sides were good
column7: rather than creamier mac and cheese
